author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Google Plus Hangouts
entry.content:
We held two different Hangouts on Google+ this week. Thank you to everyone who participated!

What did you think about the format, topics, time of day, etc. of the Hangouts? We'd want to hear your feedback! Should we keep doing these? Drop us a line at info@foodfightshow.org.

Download the podcast
